label: Credit line

label: Description
value: A ground floor window is framed by a central console, a herm supported entablature, and half-figure supported pediment. In the center of the pediment is an indistinct coat-of-arms. The lower part of the window is closed by a railing. The main frieze of which represents a lyre framed by scrolls. A women, in profile, leans upon the railing.

label: Physical description
value: Pencil, pen, brush, and dark water color.

label: Credit line
